name: @solana-ticket/event-ticketing
description: Solana-based event ticketing system with pNFTs

scripts.all: npm run security && npm run mint && npm run test && npm run summary
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && python3 -m http.server 3000 || python -m http.server 3000
scripts.backend: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.minting-service: cd minting-service && npm install && npm start
scripts.servers: npm run backend & npm run minting-service & npm run frontend
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../minting-service && npm install

author: SY EDI 09
